name: LOGistICAL: Chile
description: LOGistICAL: Chile is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country with over 100 towns to Complete.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256+MB with 1024x768 resolution Storage: 300 MB available space
